posts.post_title: ***SOLD***  Old Judge Manager - Watch Burnham - incredible image!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
Here is a very rare Old Judge Manager - Watch Burnham



$400 - first email to say I'll take it, gets it!



This card was in a SGC 50 case... I have no clue why it crossed to PSA as AUTHENTIC!!!!



The image quality is absolutely awesome!
